attributes.action: prevent Parliamentary Privilege being used as a bar to criminal proceedings and restrict its use to proceedings which are wholly civil in nature
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Parliamentary privilege is fundamental to the existence of any democracy, but in criminal matters the Rule of Law demands that no one is above the law and Parliamentary Privilege should be not be used to sanction behaviour which otherwise would amount to criminal conduct; that is not the use of Parliamentary Privilege but the abuse of Parliamentary Privilege.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
